text: @SenSchumer Have you noticed Chuck Schumer is from the state with the most Covid19 deaths, he didn't do anything to stop the nursing home admit scandal? Why doesn't he do anything?  He ALLOWED New Yorkers to die, not raising a hand. Why Chuck???
